author: R Srikanth
text:
The Government Railway Police (GRP) in Tamil Nadu has taken to social media to reach a wider audience. The GRP recently launched its Twitter account — Railway Police CNI (@grpchennai).

A senior official of GRP said the department felt there was a need to interact with rail passengers on a wider platform and hence, Twitter was chosen.

He said the department has been getting positive feedback on its social media presence.

Also, the social media platform could be used for sharing railway awareness issues and contact details to reach the public. The official pointed out a small team is engaged in providing live tweets to the public. – Staff Reporter

The railway police has been getting positive feedback about its social media presence
title: GRP reaches rail passengers via Twitter
